component.name: ToolZoomout
component.file: ToolZoomout.swf (compiled component, needed for publication on internet)
ToolZoomout.xml (configurationfile, needed for publication on internet)
component.description: Tool for zooming the a map by dragging a rectangle or just clicking the map

configtag.name: <fmc:ToolZoomout>
<fmc:ToolZoomout>

attribute.name: clickdelay
clickdelay
attribute.description: (defaultvalue "1000") Time in milliseconds (1000 = 1 second) between releasing the mouse and updating the map when the user clicks the map. In this time the user can click again and the update of the map wil be postponed.

attribute.name: zoomdelay
zoomdelay
attribute.description: (defaultvalue "0") Time in milliseconds (1000 = 1 second) between releasing the mouse and updating the map when the user drags a rectangle.

attribute.name: zoomfactor
zoomfactor
attribute.description: (defaultvalue "200") A percentage the map will zoom after the user clicked the map.

configtag.description: This tag defines a tool for zooming a map. There are two actions; 1 dragging a rectangle and 2 clicking the map (the map wil recenter at the position the user has clicked).
